sentences.english: American grebe having a black-banded whitish bill.
sentences.chinese: 发白的嘴上有黑色斑纹的美洲。

sentences.english: A black, a tabby cat and four children perform a kiddy jazz.
sentences.chinese: 一只黑色斑纹猫和四个小孩跳爵士舞。

sentences.english: A black and tabby cat and four children perform a kiddy jazz.
sentences.chinese: 一只黑色斑纹猫和四个小孩跳爵士舞。

sentences.english: Jizhou kiln temoku were noted for its particular stripe and color.
sentences.chinese: 吉州窑天目釉瓷因具独特的斑纹和色彩而享有盛名。

sentences.english: Larvae red body green, the body head on many of the rules was markings.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫头红体绿，体上生很多有规则的斑纹。

sentences.english: He had markings that looked a bit like a mustache  and goatee .
sentences.chinese: 它的面部还有看起来有点像小胡子的斑纹。

sentences.english: Black with tan markings, either of rich chestnut or mahogany color.
sentences.chinese: 黑色带棕色斑纹，也可以是栗色或桃木色。

sentences.english: Zebra finches are widely domesticated around the world.
sentences.chinese: 斑纹草雀被笼养在世界各地。

sentences.english: These sharks are named " Wobbegong", an indigenous Australian word that means "bearded".
sentences.chinese: 这些鲨鱼名为斑纹须，是澳洲原住民语胡须的意思。

sentences.english: Chatter marks can appear on both bare and painted metal.
sentences.chinese: 斑纹可能出现在裸露的钢带和彩涂板上。

sentences.english: This subspecies shows differences with A. a. punctatissima in both body size and elytral maculation.
sentences.chinese: 本亚种在体型及斑纹与锚纹虎甲虫有所差异。

sentences.english: Zebra finches breed after periods of heavy rainfall, at any time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 斑纹草雀在每年的暴雨之后的的任何时期均可繁殖。

sentences.english: Below is a close up photo of the head of a sable male with the distinguishing sable markings.
sentences.chinese: 下一张图片是有区别的貂色斑纹的公犬。

sentences.english: And Australian scientists have successfully bred seven wobbegong sharks to release into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲科学家成功孵育七只斑纹须鲨，释放海中。

sentences.english: Black-and-tan or liver color to be disqualified.
sentences.chinese: 黑色带褐色斑纹或肝色属于失格。

sentences.english: This is commonly referred to as a tricolor. The…
sentences.chinese: 下一张图片是有区别的貂色斑纹的公犬。

definition: (of an animal) appearance or color of coat
dark spot or blotch on the skin
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
